# Support

> Getting help with Pain Tracker

## ğŸ“š Documentation

Before asking for help, please check our comprehensive documentation:

- **[README](../README.md)** - Project overview and getting started
- **[Quickstart Guide](../QUICKSTART.md)** - Fast setup instructions
- **[Documentation Index](../docs/README.md)** - Full documentation hub
- **[FAQ (if available)](../docs/FAQ.md)** - Frequently asked questions

## ğŸ› Bug Reports

If you've found a bug, please [open an issue](https://github.com/CrisisCore-Systems/pain-tracker/issues/new) with:

- Clear description of the problem
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Screenshots (if applicable)
- Browser/environment details

## ğŸ’¡ Feature Requests

Have an idea for a new feature? [Open an issue](https://github.com/CrisisCore-Systems/pain-tracker/issues/new) with:

- Clear description of the feature
- Use case and benefits
- Any implementation ideas

## ğŸ’¬ Questions & Discussions

For general questions, discussions, or help:

- **[GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/CrisisCore-Systems/pain-tracker/discussions)** - Ask questions and discuss ideas
- **[Issues](https://github.com/CrisisCore-Systems/pain-tracker/issues)** - For specific bugs or feature requests

## ğŸ”’ Security Issues

**Do not** open public issues for security vulnerabilities. Instead:

- Use [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/CrisisCore-Systems/pain-tracker/security/advisories/new)
- Or review our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md)

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

Interested in contributing? Check out:

- **[Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)** - How to contribute
- **[Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)** - Community guidelines
- **[Good First Issues](https://github.com/CrisisCore-Systems/pain-tracker/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22)** - Issues for new contributors
